    • Constructor Detail

      • Transaction

        public Transaction()
        Empty Constructor

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(int userId,
                   java.lang.String ticker,
                   java.sql.Timestamp date,
                   boolean buy,
                   int quantity,
                   double price)
        Constructor for creating transaction objects
        Parameters:
        userId - Id of the user who made the transaction
        ticker - Ticker symbol of the stock involved in the transaction
        date - The date of the transaction
        buy - Boolean value that indicates if the user was buying or selling
        quantity - The number of shares involved in the transaction
        price - The cost of the transaction

      • getBuy

        public boolean getBuy()
        Get the buy status
        Returns:
